title: CS Practical Competency Enhancement: Science Task Competency Transfer Education Through Error Prevention Training Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can perform science experiment procedures with 90% accuracy through VR simulations.
It can reduce errors in the training process by more than 50%.

After one week of training, learners independently apply experimental procedures (e.g., product usage instructions, problem-solving protocols) in three simulated customer interaction scenarios, demonstrating performance that meets at least 4 of 5 evaluator checklist items.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
